btn_save_and_next: Save and Proceed to Next Step
tip_step1: Go to WeChat Official Account Backend (https://developers.weixin.qq.com/console/product), select 'Mini Program' from 'My Business and Services' in the top-left corner, then obtain developer information in [Basic Information]
ph_enter_mini_program_name: Please enter your mini program name
label_add_ip_to_whitelist: Add the following IP to the mini program IP whitelist. If IP whitelist protection is not enabled, you may skip this step
tip_step2: Go to WeChat Official Account Backend (https://developers.weixin.qq.com/console/product), configure and enable server settings in [Basic Information - Domain and Message Push Configuration - Message Push]. Please follow the configuration shown in the image below
title_step1: - Fill in Mini Program Development Information
msg_enter_official_account_name: Please enter your official account name
